name: Find The Criminal
description:
Find The Criminal

This is a little project of mine in which I experimented with the UI and tried to make it physical and stuff. 

This is just a project that I wanted to show. I don't think it will become anything more than a prototype.

I am imagining this would be some kind of Papers Please kind of game in which you have to find the criminal based on a description.

There isn't any gameplay at the moment and I don't think I will add any.
